entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing rain late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow mixed with freezing rain. Low minus 6.

entry.title: Friday: Snow or rain. High plus 2.
